Testing Instructions

All pages work without authentication in Dev Mode

Use the role switcher in the sidebar to see different views

Mock data is displayed when the database is not connected

Job detail pages use mock IDs (mock-1, mock-2, mock-3)

All API routes have fallback mock data for development

Click any page above to navigate and test functionality
